snippet.title: A different world: How one small college is quitting sports -- and might lead a revolution
snippet.description:
A different world: How one small college is quitting sports -- and might lead a revolution by Luke Cyphers on Apr 16 2013, 11:54a
In the beginning, Danyelle Carter had only one thought: I'm going to die. The 7 a.m. boot camp workout class at Spelman College is a muscle-testing, lung-battering trial for even the fittest. And...
